(undisciplined [undisciplined], animal [animal], wasteland-survival [wastesurvival], mountain-survival [mountainsurvival])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Cynocephalians are dog-headed beast-men living in the lands of Ind. The Magnificent kingdom has armies of brave and righteous men, but it is not they who wage the wars of the kingdom. Instead it is savage flesh-eaters and cynocephalians subjugated by the Prester King who in times of war are unleashed upon the world. Cynocephalian Hunters of Ind still use simple armaments.
